assassin: Shortsword 1: [1d20 + 6] vs AC; [1d6 + 3] piercing; DC15 ConS (half) or [7d6] poison
Shortsword 2: [1d20 + 6] vs AC; [1d6 + 3] piercing; DC15 ConS (half) or [7d6] poison
assassin.bow: Light Crossbow: [1d20 + 6] vs AC; [1d8 + 3] piercing and DC 15 ConS (half) or [7d6] poison
displacer: Tentacle 1: [1d20 + 6] vs AC; [1d6 + 4] bludgeoning and [1d6] piercing
Tentacle 2: [1d20 + 6] vs AC; [1d6 + 4] bludgeoning and [1d6] piercing
ghast: Claws: [1d20 + 5] vs AC; [2d6 + 3] slashing and DC 10 ConS or paralyzed
ghoul: Claws: [1d20 + 4] vs AC; [2d4 + 2] slashing and DC 10 ConS or paralyzed
